resources.string: Please select a market to get started
"Be the first to review and rate this Market. "
Receive Orders from customers and provide them home delivery.
Notice :\nYour account is not activated. Please contact support to activate your account.
Alert : Your service is stopped due to low balance in your account. Please add balance to start your service.
Pick from Shop - Customer will pick this order from the shop when its ready for pickup. This order need not delivered to the home.
Home Delivery - This order will be delivered to the customers address by the shop owner.
Attention : Your services are paused due to low balance in your account please add balance to resume your services !
